name: King Score Card
tagline: A simple stats tracker for the King of Tokyo
body: King Score Card is a simple health, victory point, and energy cube tracking application for "King of Tokyo"-style games. This app is the perfect companion for game night with friends. No more dealing with loose dials on the placards or those pesky energy cubes. Simply swipe the appropriate dial and easily keep your stats at your fingertips. ### Features: - Swipeable stat areas to easy track monster status - Victory point tracking (0-20) - Health tracking (Standard 10-0 and Upgraded 12-11) - Energy cube tracking (0-25) - Quick-Reset button Available on the iOS App Store.
